headline: Jim Cramer Is Bullish On This Tech Stock: 'Continue To Own It'
summary: On CNBC's “Mad Money Lightning Round,” Jim Cramer said NetApp, Inc. (NASDAQ:NTAP) is an “ok company.” On the earnings front, NetApp, on Nov. 25, reported better-than-expected second-quarter financial results and raised its FY26 adjusted EPS guidance. NetApp reported quarterly earnings of $2.05 per share, which beat the consensus estimate of $1.89. Quarterly revenue came in at $1.71 billion, which beat the Street estimate of $1.69 billion. Don't Miss: If there was a new fund backed by Jeff Bezos
